name.ja: スカルライズ・スコール

effect.en: Ritual Summon "Gaigustvelgr the Defiant Soulclad Sword" by sending face-up Zombie Type monsters from your field to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal 5 or more as material (you cannot use more monsters than necessary as material). Then, if you sent a monster whose original name is "Gaigust the Defiant Soul" to the Graveyard by this effect, you can destroy 1 face-down card on your opponent's field.
